Given the current state of the maze, your avatar is at (row 4, col 14) which is your standing position denoted by '&'. You are surrounded by walls (e) and tunnels (d), with the immediate goal of reaching the exit at (row 12, col 24), denoted by '$'. 

The important mechanics and strategy suggest that you should navigate carefully to avoid any encounters with pursuers and potential alien threats, which are located in various parts of the map, such as @ (alien tunnels).

Looking at your position:
- To the left (5,14) is a wall.
- To the right (4,15) is a free area.
- Up (3,14) is a free area.
- Down (5,14) also has a tunnel.

Given the free areas available and needing to advance towards the exit, moving either up or down would allow you to explore more. 

I will choose to first move down towards the tunnel (4,14) to (5,14) to explore and assess possible movements towards the exit.

``` Action:3 ```
This action will move me to the position (5,14) which allows further exploration of nearby paths toward the exit and to assess possible encounters with pursuers.
